name: Clean Sweep (Nomron)
description:
Note: if all else fails, try jumping in the hole.

A 2D platformer where your goal is to clean the floors of an infinite hotel. Created in 9 days for the Atlas Rloue Gamejam 2022, with the theme 'infinite'. Also a spiritual successor to my game Broomba, which you should not play.

Cover art made by my sibling

Sprites, music, sound effects, and everything else made by me.
